script:
1). Isn't Demetri supposed to help us?
Yes, but she's out sick today. 
No, she is supposed to.
Yes, she would help us.
2). Didn't you use to work in sales?
Yes, I work in sales.
Yes, I used to. 
Yes, I'll do it.
3). Do you have time to run an errand for me?
I run at 7 o'clock every morning.
Yes, it's a quarter to eight.
Sure, I've got a few minutes.
